Package com.example.app.service

Interface ManagerService

All Superinterfaces:
UserService
All Known Implementing Classes:
ManagerServiceImpl
public interface ManagerService extends UserService
Service interface for managing projects and registrations. This interface extends the UserService interface. It provides methods for managing project creation, updating, visibility toggling, registration status updates, and application management.

  • Method Details

    • createProject

      Project createProject(Manager manager, String projectName, Date applicationOpenDate, Date applicationCloseDate, String neighborhood, boolean visibility, Integer officerLimit, Set<Integer> officers, Set<MaritalStatus> groups, Map<FlatType,Integer> flats) throws IOException, IllegalStateException
      Create a new project.
      Parameters:
      manager - the manager creating the project
      projectName - the name of the project
      applicationOpenDate - the date when applications open
      applicationCloseDate - the date when applications close
      neighborhood - the neighborhood of the project
      visibility - the visibility of the project
      officerLimit - the limit on the number of officers
      officers - the set of officer IDs
      groups - the set of marital status groups
      flats - the map of flat types and their quantities
      Returns:
      the created project object
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs
      IllegalStateException - if project creation fails due to time overlap

    • updateProject

      Project updateProject(Manager manager, int projectId, String projectName, Date applicationOpenDate, Date applicationCloseDate, String neighborhood, boolean visibility, Set<MaritalStatus> groups, Map<FlatType,Integer> flats) throws IOException
      Update an existing project.
      Parameters:
      manager - the manager updating the project
      projectId - the ID of the project
      projectName - the name of the project
      applicationOpenDate - the date when applications open
      applicationCloseDate - the date when applications close
      neighborhood - the neighborhood of the project
      visibility - the visibility of the project
      groups - the set of marital status groups
      flats - the map of flat types and their quantities
      Returns:
      the updated project object
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs

    • isProjectBelongToManager

      boolean isProjectBelongToManager(Manager manager, int projectId) throws IOException
      Check if a project belongs to the manager. Since the manager can own multiple projects
      Parameters:
      manager - the manager
      projectId - the ID of the project
      Returns:
      true if the project belongs to the manager, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      Toggle the visibility of a project.
      Parameters:

      projectId - the ID of the project
      Returns:
      the updated project object
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs
      IllegalStateException - if the project does not belong to the manager

      Parameters:

      registrationId - the ID of the registration
      status - the new status of the registration
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs
      IllegalStateException - if the project does not belong to the manager
      NullPointerException - if the registration or officer not found

    • getBookedApplicationsReport

      Generate a list of booked applications matching given filters
      Parameters:
      maritalStatus - the marital status of the applicant
      flatType - the type of flat applied for
      projectName - the name of the project
      minAge - the minimum age of the applicant
      maxAge - the maximum age of the applicant
      Returns:
      a list of booked applications
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs
